attributes.action: Change the law so people accused of a crime can use a Lie Detector Test
attributes.additional_details:
There have been many genuinely innocent people found guilty by a judge or jury in the past and its time that this is reduced. Now its fair to say that a Lie Detector Test is not 100% accurate but is in fact 95-98% accurate according to much research.

Please sign this petition to help people who are genuinely innocent the chance to live a normal life.
attributes.background: A friend is in a terrible situation where I truly believe that he is innocent but this country does not allow a defendant to take a Lie Detector Test to prove their innocence and use as part of their defence in court if they wish to do so.
